content.rendered:
Sports are essential for a person´s integral development, something our school appreciates and encourages by strengthening our students´ physical and mental growth.  In preschool, we follow a comprehensive program focused on gross motor skill development, systematically addressing different physical abilities.  In primary school, we explore various athletic activities which help instill habits pertaining to physical activity.  Once in secondary school, emphasis is placed on deepening understanding and skills needed to participate in sporting events.

Our school offers students extracurricular activities in the following areas: track and field, gymnastics, Taekwondo, soccer, basketball, chess, swimming, and tennis.  At a competitive level, we have representation in track and field, basketball.
